LanguageData.akame.label: Ram-horned akame
LanguageData.akame.description:
Ram-horned akames are the timid sister species of the ram-horned aone.
Ram-horned akames are known to carry a small stuffed bear-like spirit they call Kumagon. They will throw the bear at attackers, causing the spirit to defend the ram-horned akame.
LanguageData.akame.tools.0.label: Kumagon
LanguageData.akame.tools.1.label: Kumagon
